title: False City Lord Revealed · Black Phoenix Standoff

scenes.description: 画面淡入,展现云雾缭绕的仙域上空,金色卷轴在空中展开,光芒闪动,背景音乐渐起。

visual.composition: Misty immortal skies with a golden scroll unfurling
visual.environment: Immortal realm sky filled with swirling clouds and golden light
visual.fx: Golden radiance and unfolding scroll effect

scenes.prompt: Xianxia opening, mist-wreathed immortal sky with a golden scroll unfurling, spiritual particles drifting, wide shot, cinematic lighting, 4K
scenes.narration: 我是云卷仙音,欢迎回来。第11集:假城主现·黑凤对峙。

scenes.description: 韩立追踪假赵城主百里,来到一座小土包前。

visual.composition: Han Li tracks the fake Zhao City Lord for a hundred miles to a small mound

scenes.prompt: Han Li shadows the impostor city lord for a hundred miles until they reach a small knoll.
scenes.narration: 韩立追踪假赵城主百里，来到一座小土包前，停下观察。

scenes.description: 假赵城主在土包顶部停下,几名手下困惑跟随。

visual.composition: The fake city lord halts atop the mound while a few subordinates trail in confusion

scenes.prompt: The impostor city lord pulls up at the mound’s crest, his followers bewildered.
scenes.narration: 假赵城主忽然在土包顶勒住坐骑,手下茫然停下。

scenes.description: 异变突起,一只狻狼足下土地裂开,连人带狼被吞噬。

visual.composition: A sudden fissure opens beneath a suanni wolf, devouring both beast and rider

scenes.prompt: The ground rips open beneath a suanni wolf, swallowing rider and mount whole.
scenes.narration: 一只狻狼足下土地突然裂开,连人带狼瞬间被吞没。

scenes.description: 两根骨矛从地下激射而出,洞穿两名骑士。

visual.composition: Bone spears rocket from underground, skewering two riders

scenes.prompt: Two bone spears burst from the ground and impale a pair of riders.
scenes.narration: 两根骨矛从地下激射而出,两名骑士瞬间毙命。

scenes.description: 最后一人欲逃,三颗乌黑蟒首咬住,将其撕成三截。

visual.composition: The last rider tries to flee but three black serpent heads latch on and tear him apart

scenes.prompt: The final rider bolts only to be seized by three ebony serpent heads and ripped into thirds.
scenes.narration: 最后一人欲逃，三颗蟒首咬住，将其撕成三截，惨不忍睹。

scenes.description: 两只蛇妖和一只巨大沙虫从地下窜出,假赵城主吩咐收拾痕迹。

visual.composition: Two serpent demons and a massive sand worm burst up as the fake city lord orders them to tidy the scene

scenes.prompt: Two serpent fiends and a giant sand worm surge from underground while the impostor commands them to erase the traces.
scenes.narration: 蛇妖和沙虫从地下窜出,假赵城主吩咐收拾干净。

scenes.description: 假赵城主击毙坐骑狻狼,女童神色平静。

visual.composition: The fake Zhao City Lord kills his suanni mount while the little girl remains eerily calm

scenes.prompt: The impostor city lord casually crushes his suanni mount as the girl watches without emotion.
scenes.narration: 假赵城主反手一拍，狼兽头颅如西瓜般碎裂，威力惊人。

scenes.description: 假赵城主凝聚黑枪,射向韩立藏身处。

visual.composition: The impostor condenses a black spear and launches it toward Han Li’s hiding place

scenes.prompt: The fake Zhao City Lord forms a jet-black spear and fires it like lightning at Han Li’s hideout.
scenes.narration: 假赵城主凝聚黑枪，闪电般射向韩立藏身处，速度极快。

scenes.description: 韩立金拳击溃黑枪,现身而出。

visual.composition: Han Li shatters the black spear with a golden fist and steps into view

scenes.prompt: Han Li breaks the black spear with his golden fist and appears openly.
scenes.narration: 金拳击溃黑枪，韩立现身而出，气势如虹，威压四方。

scenes.description: 假赵城主下令击杀韩立,三妖同时扑来。

visual.composition: At the impostor’s command the three monsters lunge at Han Li together

scenes.prompt: The fake city lord orders Han Li killed and the trio of demons pounces in unison.
scenes.narration: 假赵城主下令,蛇妖和沙虫同时扑向韩立。

scenes.description: 韩立金拳击碎骨矛,身形一闪躲过绿液。

visual.composition: Han Li smashes the bone spear with a golden fist and sidesteps the splash of green venom

scenes.prompt: Han Li pulverizes the bone spear with his golden fist and flickers aside from the corrosive green fluid.
scenes.narration: 韩立金拳击碎骨矛,身形一闪躲过腐蚀绿液。

scenes.description: 三颗乌黑蛇首咬住韩立双肩和脖颈。

visual.composition: Three black serpent heads clamp onto Han Li’s shoulders and neck

scenes.prompt: Three ebony serpent heads latch onto Han Li’s shoulders and throat.
scenes.narration: 三颗乌黑蛇首咬住韩立双肩和脖颈，形势危急，生死一线。

scenes.description: 韩立扭断蛇首,双掌如刀斩落另两颗头颅。

visual.composition: Han Li snaps one serpent head and chops off the other two with blade-like palms

scenes.prompt: Han Li wrenches one serpent head apart and cleaves the remaining two with golden palms.
scenes.narration: 韩立扭断蛇首,双掌金光一闪,另两颗头颅滚落。

scenes.description: 韩立身形幻化,数道幻影迎向蛇妖和沙虫,血雨洒落。

visual.composition: Han Li’s figure multiplies into afterimages that carve through the serpent demons and sand worm, raining blood

scenes.prompt: Han Li splits into streaks of afterimages, shredding the serpent demons and sand worm in a shower of blood.
scenes.narration: 韩立身形如幻,蛇妖和沙虫瞬间毙命,血雨洒落。

scenes.description: 韩立质问假赵城主是傀儡,煞气大放。

visual.composition: Han Li demands to know if the impostor is a puppet, murderous aura flaring

scenes.prompt: Han Li snarls at the false city lord, accusing him of being a puppet as his killing aura erupts.
scenes.narration: 韩立质问假城主是傀儡,身上煞气大放。

scenes.description: 假赵城主称赞韩立秘术和煞气,询问其来历。

visual.composition: The false city lord praises Han Li’s arts and aura while asking about his origins

scenes.prompt: The impostor commends Han Li’s secret techniques and murderous aura, probing his background.
scenes.narration: 假城主询问韩立来历,声音不含感情。

scenes.description: 韩立拒绝回答,要假城主自行了断,金光一闪走向土包。

visual.composition: Han Li refuses to answer, telling the impostor to end himself as golden light flares and he strides toward the mound

scenes.prompt: Han Li declines to respond, ordering the impostor to finish himself as he advances in a blaze of gold.
scenes.narration: 韩立要假城主自行了断,金光一闪大步上前。

scenes.description: 土包上空空间波动,黑焰闪现,宫装少妇现形。

visual.composition: Space ripples above the mound as black flames flash and a palace-clad young woman materializes

scenes.prompt: Space warps above the mound, black flames flare, and a palace-dressed black phoenix woman appears.
scenes.narration: 土包上空黑焰闪现,宫装少妇现形而出。

scenes.description: 韩立察觉危险,取出两颗灭仙珠托在身前。

visual.composition: Sensing danger, Han Li lifts two Extinction Beads before him

scenes.prompt: Feeling the threat, Han Li produces two Extinction Beads and cradles them in front of his chest.
scenes.narration: 韩立察觉危险,取出两颗灭仙珠托在身前。

scenes.description: 黑凤族妖女认出灭仙珠,脸色大变,双方僵持。

visual.composition: The black phoenix demoness recognizes the Extinction Beads, face paling as both sides freeze

scenes.prompt: The black phoenix woman reels upon seeing the Extinction Beads and the confrontation locks into a stalemate.
scenes.narration: 黑凤族妖女认出灭仙珠,双方陷入僵持。

scenes.description: 妖女使用迷魂大法,瞳孔紫芒闪动,韩立眼神变得茫然。

visual.composition: The demoness activates a soul confusion art, purple light flashing in her pupils as Han Li's eyes turn vacant
visual.character_pose: Woman's eyes glowing, Han Li dazed

scenes.prompt: The black phoenix woman uses soul confusion art, purple light in her eyes as Han Li's gaze becomes blank.
scenes.narration: 妖女施展迷魂大法,瞳孔紫芒闪动,韩立眼神变得茫然。

scenes.description: 韩立瞳孔蓝芒大放,反噬妖女,妖女差点从空中坠落。

visual.composition: Han Li's pupils burst with blue light, countering the demoness who nearly falls from the sky
visual.character_pose: Han Li's eyes flaring blue, woman staggering

scenes.prompt: Han Li's eyes blaze blue, rebounding the soul confusion art and nearly knocking the demoness from the air.
scenes.narration: 韩立瞳孔蓝芒大放,反噬妖女,妖女差点从空中坠落。

scenes.description: 黛儿喊话,说自己自愿跟随姑姑,因为传承珠让她知道半妖身份。

visual.composition: Dai'er calls out, saying she willingly follows her aunt because the inheritance bead revealed her half-demon nature

scenes.prompt: The girl Dai'er declares she will go with her aunt after the inheritance bead awakened her half-demon heritage.
scenes.narration: 黛儿喊话,说自己自愿跟随姑姑,因为传承珠让她知道半妖身份。

scenes.description: 韩立确认黛儿决心后,轻叹一声,转身离开。

visual.composition: Han Li confirms Dai'er's resolve, sighs softly, then turns and strides away
visual.character_pose: Han Li walking away, beads in hand

scenes.prompt: After confirming the girl's determination, Han Li sighs and departs, leaving with the beads still in hand.
scenes.narration: 韩立确认黛儿决心后,轻叹一声,转身离开。

scenes.description: 黑凤族妖女焚毁假赵城主尸体,化为黑光吸入体内,带着黛儿消失。

visual.composition: The black phoenix woman burns the fake city lord's corpse, converting it to black light and absorbing it, then vanishes with Dai'er
visual.character_pose: Woman consuming black light, girl held

scenes.prompt: The black phoenix demoness incinerates the puppet corpse, absorbs it as black light, and vanishes with the child.
scenes.narration: 黑凤族妖女焚毁假城主尸体,化为黑光吸入体内,带着黛儿消失。

scenes.description: 次日清晨,营地中数道遁光飞起,金玉宗修士与韩立出发取宝。

visual.composition: At dawn the next day, several beams of light rise from the camp as the Gold Jade Sect cultivators and Han Li set off
visual.character_pose: Cultivators on flying swords, Han Li in protective light bubble

scenes.prompt: At dawn the next morning, beams of light streak from the camp as cultivators and Han Li depart for the treasure hunt.
scenes.narration: 次日清晨,营地中数道遁光飞起,金玉宗修士与韩立出发取宝。

scenes.description: 画面淡出,夜色下的仙城剪影,天空洒落灵光,画面逐渐变暗。

visual.composition: Silhouette of the immortal city beneath night, spiritual light raining from the heavens
visual.environment: Night sky, city silhouette, floating light particles

scenes.prompt: Xianxia ending, immortal city silhouette under the night sky, spiritual particles drifting down, calm mysterious atmosphere, wide shot, cinematic lighting, 4K
scenes.narration: 下一集再见。我是云卷仙音,原著作者忘语。第12集即将开始。
